mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.apply_id AS "applyId", a.period AS "period", a.monthly_payment_origin AS "monthlyPaymentOrigin", a.monthly_payment_actual AS "monthlyPaymentActual", a.manage_fee AS "manageFee", a.fails_charge_origin AS "failsChargeOrigin", a.fails_charge_actual AS "failsChargeActual", a.late_charge_origin AS "lateChargeOrigin", a.late_charge_actual AS "lateChargeActual", a.repay_status AS "repayStatus", a.repay_time AS "repayTime", a.plan_repay_amount AS "planRepayAmount", a.month_capital AS "monthCapital", a.month_interest AS "monthInterest", a.contract_id AS "contractId", a.noallotamount AS "noallotamount", a.remains_principal AS "remainsPrincipal", a.prepayment_amount AS "prepaymentAmount", a.prepayment_failscharge AS "prepaymentFailscharge", a.roll_out_id AS "rollOutId", a.is_overdue AS "isOverdue", a.late_payment_time AS "latePaymentTime", a.parking_fee AS "parkingFee"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_borrow_billplan a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM t_borrow_billplan a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
